channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Park Hyatt Marrakech finally gets its long-awaited debut
item.description: Park Hyatt is making a much-hyped debut in Morocco. The property officially opened this week after a soft opening phase at the beginning of this year....

item.title: Emirates’ first revamped 777 takes off in August with ‘A380-inspired’ cabin — including premium economy
